page.title: 05GOODS DELIVERED TO PEBMARSH
page.content: Daily{newspapers}are delivered by Sue and John Day of Clay Hills. {Milk}is delivered daily by Ipswich Cooperative Society and Tanner's Dairies of Sible Hedingham.The Co-op use an electric float while Tanner's use a van.A pint of milk costs 22p. {Bread}is delivered in a van which comes from Haverhill every day. {Groceries}come from Bures every Saturday.Also on Saturday,{fish}and{ {meat}come in a van from Sudbury. {Pet food}is delivered on Saturday by Mr.Lock who has shops in Halstead and Hedingham. {Coal}is delivered fortnightly through the winter by Brett's of Hedingham.{Heating oil}and{gas}are supplied on order by Bulldog,Charrington,Conoco,Dixon-Scott and Totalheat.
